legendText.descrip1: When Oath of Nissa enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
legendText.descrip2: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast planeswalker spells.

legends.flavor: ”For the life of every plane, I will keep watch.”
